EVEN the worst can get them.  15) Letters up front also cause invisible hurdles that harm certain applicants out of the gate. If a critical letter writer is a new PI and is overwhelmed with lots of things, or maybe the PI is a URM and already spends more time than others on letters, these things have cascading effects that can cause career drags on letter writers. The practice to continue to ask for letters up front is 100% problematic.
